results.title: Mechanism and application of metformin in kidney diseases: An update.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also contributes to the alleviation of @<m>DISEASE_Urolithiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052878 @@@urolithiasis@@@ and @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Renal_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D002292 @@@renal cell carcinoma@@@ (@DISEASE_Carcinoma_Renal_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D002292 @@@RCC@@@).

citations.NLM: Song A, Zhang C, Meng X. Mechanism and application of metformin in kidney diseases: An update. Biomed Pharmacother. 2021 Jun;138():111454. PMID: 33714781

results.title: Lump in the throat - a case study.
results.text_hl: He had @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, stable @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@ischaemic heart disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Urolithiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052878 @@@urolithiasis@@@ and @DISEASE_Prostatic_Hyperplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D011470 @@@benign prostatic hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Gabb G, Andrew N. Lump in the throat - a case study. Aust Fam Physician. 2013 Dec;42(12):863-6. PMID: 24324987
